predicate.note: Frames file for 'coo' based on sentences in BROWN. VN entries in animal_sounds-38 and in manner_speaking-37.3. Class 38 seems more approporiate.

roleset.name: make a noise like a dove

example.name: intransitive
example.text: There have been cooing doves , chattering magpies , thieving jackdaws , a proud peacock , a silly goose , and a harpy eagle -- whom I was silly enough [*] to mate with [*T*-2] and who [*T*-1] is now [*-3] busy tearing at my vitals'' .
